titles.title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate Pennsylvania State route 60 as part of the Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 10/4/2001--Introduced. Amends the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate Pennsylvania State route 60 as part of the Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.
